name: TOMB RAIDER FORMENTHERA
description:
After many years studying ancient Egypt, Lara deciphered an artifact, The Kamé, the ancients believed it was a physical and astal connection. Lara, 19, followed the trail of the Government of Nevada, where she lost her precious track, but found, in some magazines: Formenthera, some facilities abandoned by mysterious assaults.

Controls;

WASD- Move

Mouse -View

Alt -Roll

Ctrl -Crouch

Left/Rigth Mouse click's -Aim and Shoot

E -Use/Pick and climb in the air

F- FlashLight

Tab -Menu

Tested in Windows 10,64, Descompress and launch the .exe
